Name.BusinessNameLine1: UNITED WAY OF BRADLEY CO INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO BE A COMMUNITY-BASED ORGANIZATION THAT LEADS THE EFFORTS IN IDENTIFYING COMMUNITY NEEDS, FACILITATING COLLABORATION, AND MAXIMIZING RESOURCES TO POSITIVELY IMPACT OUR COMMUNITY AND SURROUNDING AREAS.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO BE A COMMUNITY-BASED ORGANIZATION THAT LEADS THE EFFORTS IN IDENTIFYING COMMUNITY NEEDS, FACILITATING COLLABORATION, AND MAXIMIZING RESOURCES TO POSITIVELY IMPACT OUR COMMUNITY AND SURROUNDING AREAS.
IRS990.Description: TO BE A COMMUNITY-BASED ORGANIZATION THAT LEADS THE EFFORTS IN IDENTIFYING COMMUNITY NEEDS, FACILITATING COLLABORATION, AND MAXIMIZING RESOURCES TO POSITIVELY IMPACT OUR COMMUNITY AND SURROUNDING AREAS.

Activity2.Description: BRADLEY MEMORIAL HEALTH ENDOWMENT FUND TO PROVIDE FUNDING TO LOCAL AGENCIES THAT IMPROVE AND ENHANCE HEALTHCARE, WELLNESS AND QUALITY OF LIFE OF THE CITIZENS OF BRADLEY COUNTY, TENNESSEE.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THE ENDOWMENT FUND WAS ESTABLISHED TO FUND LOCAL NON-PROFITS TO IMPROVE AND ENHANCE HEALTHCARE, WELLNESS AND QUALITY OF LIFE OF THE CITIZENS OF BRADLEY COUNTY.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: PROCEDURES FOR MONITORING THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS INSIDE THE UNITED STATES
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: GRANTEES ARE REQUIRED TO SUBMIT BUDGET REQUESTS TO BE APPROVED FOR GRANTS. GRANTEES ARE THEN REQUIRED TO SUBMIT MONTHLY FINANCIAL INFORMATION TO SUPPORT DRAW REQUEST ON GRANT.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: EXPLANATION ON VOLUNTEERS AND TYPES OF SERVICES OR BENEFITS
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: INDIVIDUALS VOLUNTEER THEIR TIME AND PERFORM A VARIETY OF TASKS THAT ASSIST THE ORGANIZATION WITH CAMPAIGN SOLICITATIONS AND VARIOUS COMMITEE ASSIGNMENTS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE AUDITOR PRESENTS THE AUDIT TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE FOR APPROVAL PRIOR TO FILING FORM 990. THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE PRESIDENT AND IS AVAILABLE FOR THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND/OR BOARD.
ANY VIOLATIONS OF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE TO BE REPORTED TO PRESIDENT AND PRESENTED TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE FOR RESOLUTION.
A PERSONNEL COMMITTEE COMPRISED OF 4 TO 5 VOLUNTEERS REVIEWS AREA AND/OR UNITED WAY WORLDWIDE SALARY RANGES AND APPROVES SALARY OF PRESIDENT.

A PERSONNEL COMMITTEE COMPRISED OF 4 TO 5 VOLUNTEERS REVIEWS AREA AND/OR UNITED WAY WORLDWIDE SALARY RANGES AND DETERMINES SALARIES. THE PRESIDENT DISCUSSES STAFF PERFORMANCE WITH PERSONNEL COMMITTEE PRIOR TO APPROVAL OF SALARIES.
DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC BY REQUEST.
